sent.orig: This makes all analysis not only of great academic significance but also of practical significance.
sent.trans: 这使得本文不仅有理论意义，更有实践意义。

sent.orig: Discussing and expounding this problem has not only profound academic significance, but also positive practical significance.
sent.trans: 对这一问题的探讨和阐发不仅具有深刻的理论意义，同时也具有积极的现实意义。

sent.orig: Lastly, narrates concisely the literary significance and cultural significance of travel literature.
sent.trans: 最后，扼要叙述了旅游文学的文学意义和文化意义。

sent.orig: The subject of this topic not only has theoretical significance, also practical significance.
sent.trans: 对本论题的研究不仅具有理论意义，更重要的是也具有现实意义。

sent.orig: Focusing on the statistical significance of one's findings while quietly doubting economic significance.
sent.trans: 关注自身研究发现的统计意义，同时又相当怀疑其经济意义。
